thread.title: Twitter went crazy for Nadiya Hussain as she was crowned Great British Bake Off winner 2015
thread.title_full: Twitter went crazy for Nadiya Hussain as she was crowned Great British Bake Off winner 2015

title: Twitter went crazy for Nadiya Hussain as she was crowned Great British Bake Off winner 2015
text:
Twitter went crazy for Nadiya Hussain as she was crowned Great British Bake Off winner 2015 Twitter went crazy for Nadiya Hussain as she was crowned Great British Bake Off winner 2015 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
After 10 weeks of kneading, proving, whipping and slicing, only iced buns, mille-feuille and showstopper cakes stood in the way of our three finalists’ victory. 
So naturally tensions were running high on Twitter, and the fountains of emotion ran over when the owner of Britain’s favourite facial expressions, Nadiya Hussain, was crowned winner. WINNER! (BBC/Love Productions/Mark Bourdillon) 
Here’s how the show went down… 
Paul spoke for the nation. 'An iced bun is a thing of beauty' never has @PaulHollywood said truer words! Iced buns! iced buns! I ❤️ iced buns! #GBBOFinal 
— Frances Gough (@frances_gough) October 7, 2015 "An iced bun is a thing of beauty" @PaulHollywood you are a man after my own heart #GBBOFinal 
— Mary Berry (@MaryBerryNOT) October 7, 2015 
Someone made a terrible mistake (sorry Ian). Oh Ian!!! School boy error forgetting the sugar!! #GBBOFinal 
— Elizabeth Noyce (@LizzieNoyce) October 7, 2015 Fatal #GBBOFinal mistake..forgetting sugar in a sweet bun dough. Or should that be d'oh. #GBBO #doh 
Mel and Sue made a great pun. That bunting / bun-ting line is the greatest thing ever #GBBOFinal 
— Jack Tindall (@jacktindall1) October 7, 2015 Just when I thought I couldn't love Mel and Sue any more, they've both come dressed as Jilly Cooper covers. #GBBOFinal 
Paul needed a wipe down. When your Iced buns are so good @PaulHollywood needs to be wiped down #GBBOFinal #TeamNadiya pic.twitter.com/5NSk7L9I4A 
— British Bake Off (@BritishBakeOff) October 7, 2015 
There was fast-paced music over the #TechChal. It's when they play the fast paced music I get so nervous #GBBOFinal 
— Alex Mack (@alexgracemack) October 7, 2015 Can you imagine how stressful it would be if they had the music we get inside the tent #GBBOFinal
